title: destinations UNLIMITED announces new South African DMC partnership
text:
destinations UNLIMITED announces new South African DMC partnership destinations UNLIMITED announces new South African DMC partnership Details Category: Agency & Association   16:30 destinations UNLIMITED, the Hampshire-based DMC Representation Company has recently appointed a new South African DMC to further enhance its collection of reputable worldwide ground handlers. Grosvenor Tours (based in Cape Town) is headed up by Peter-John Mitrovich (CEO); and complemented by Nicola Murtagh (Operations Manager) and Carlynne van der Merwe (Account Executive) 
Grosvenor Tours is owned by Cullinan Holdings, one of South Africa’s leading JSE listed Tourism and Leisure Groups, and comprises of many of Southern Africa’s leading brands in Travel and Leisure. Peter-John has worked extensively within the tourism industry, but he says “my most memorable Grosvenor Tours experiences are providing running water to the community of Henna through a giving corporate partner, being a South African during the 2010 Soccer World Cup and shaking the hand of Nelson Mandela.” Nikki Mitchell, Managing Partner at destinations UNLIMITED says; “We are thrilled to be introducing our clients to the newest addition to the dU family of DMCs! We are delighted to be able to represent this fantastic destination!” She added; “They have an office situated in Cape Town, however they offer their expertise throughout the entire destination. It’s clear that we all sing from the same hymn sheet and we are pleased that their website (like ours) is simple to use and concise; demonstrating the up-to-the-minute conference and incentive options that the DMC can offer.” Peter-John says; “We are very excited about our new partnership with destinations UNLIMITED; and very much look forward to continuing to actively place South Africa on the C&I Map.” He added; “This is an exciting time for us and we look forward to being able to bring some creative proposals to Nikki’s clients! Seeing the reward and joy on my guests’ faces as they experience up close encounters with the Big 5 is fantastic!” Related articles
